ComicInfo.Title: All in! Part 4
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: All in! Part 4: Sean escapes the Casino with Laura's help; Wade and Storm Shadow come to their rescue but Wade is badly injured in a firefight with Cobra Vipers. Dr. Mindbender reveals he's made a clone of the original Snake Eyes and activates it.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-02 23:45:54. [CVDB951816] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:39:52. [Issue ID 2443501]
